name: Fresh Mint and Cilantro Melon Salad
author: Menealeous' Daughter
summary: All the fresh greens of the herbs and melon of this easy side dish are refreshing to both the eye and the palate! The melon can be chopped bite-sized to be a salad or side, or smaller to be used as a relish or condiment. This dish is also great for a change of pace on the brunch buffet! This works well also with Crenshaw melon.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons chopped cilantro leaves and stems
⅓ cup chopped fresh mint leaves
directions: Combine the honeydew, lime juice, cilantro, mint, and sugar in a bowl; toss to combine; refrigerate at least two hours before serving
